name: 陳紅章
objective:
本課程介紹應用於粒子與剛體的靜力平衡原理。課程內容涵蓋力系統、自由體圖、平衡條件、結構分析、摩擦力、質心與慣性矩等主題。課程強調運用向量力學進行問題解析。
This course introduces the principles of static equilibrium applied to particles and rigid bodies. Topics include force systems, free-body diagrams, equilibrium, structures, friction, centroids, and moments of inertia. The course emphasizes problem-solving using vector mechanics
schedule:
Week 1 : 	Course Introduction; Units, Vectors, and Force Concepts
Week 2 :  2D Force Vectors and Components 
Week 3-4 :  3D Force Vectors; Dot and Cross Products
Week 5-6 :   Resultants of Force Systems; Equivalent Force-Couple Systems
Week 7-8 :   Equilibrium of Particles in 2D; Free Body Diagrams (FBD)
Week 9    :  Midterm Exams 
Week 10-12 :  	Equilibrium in 3D
Week 13-14 :  Analysis of Trusses (Method of Joints & Sections)
Week 15-16 : Internal Forces in Beams; Shear and Bending Moment Diagrams
Week 17 : Friction Concepts and Applications (Wedges, Belts)
Week 18 : Final Exams
materials: Hibbeler, Russell C. 2022. Engineering Mechanics: Statics. 15th ed. Hoboken, NJ: Pearson.
